text:
There is no 'peer-reviewed' #clinicaldata on #chloroquine from Western institution

We have seen clinical data from 🇨🇳but only anecdotal data in West

Simple game theory is that it's better to experiment* early stage than have overloaded #ICU with Pt on #ventilators 🤷‍♂️

#COVID19 https://t.co/qNekkhQdaR
